fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, choose a player to assume their identity and attack them with a powerful strike. You will acquire their role abilities for the duration of the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you successfully eliminate a player, you permanently gain access to their abilities for the remainder of the game. You can only possess one role's abilities at a time.
- You are immune to detection by investigative roles such as Sheriff or Investigator.
- Once during the game, you can choose to "Reveal True Form" during the day, instantly killing all players who have previously misspelled or referred to your name incorrectly in any in-game channel, including dead players.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Seek vengeance by eliminating all who stand in your way.
